title: Early stone tools
creator_credit: Extension Media Center, University of California and Clyde B Smith
brief_description: Traces the development of stone tools and parallels their development with the evolution of man from austropithecus to homo sapiens. Demonstrates percussion flaking techniques to produce a variety of tools. Shows actual prehistoric tools.
creator_credit_for_label: Extension Media Center, University of California and Clyde B Smith
